mapper.select: select INSTRUCTOR_NO as no, USER_NO as "user.no", INSTRUCTOR_SUMMARY as summary, INSTRUCTOR_DESCRIPTION as description from INSTRUCTOR where INSTRUCTOR_NO = #{value}

insert into PAID_LECTURE ( PAID_LECTURE_NO, INSTRUCTOR_NO, LECTURE_TITLE, LECTURE_LANG, LECTURE_LEVEL, LECTURE_DESCRIPTION, LECTURE_SUMMARY, LECTURE_SPECIALIZED, LECTURE_PRICE, LECTURE_THUMNAIL_PATH, LECTURE_CREATE_DATE, LECTURE_LIKES, LECTURE_VIEW_COUNT, EXPOSURE_STATUS, APPROVE_STATUS ) values (paid_lecture_seq.nextval, #{instructor.no }, #{title }, #{lang }, #{level }, #{description }, #{summary }, #{specialized }, #{price }, #{thumbnail }, sysdate, 0, 0, 'Y', 'N')
insert into INSTRUCTOR ( INSTRUCTOR_NO, USER_NO, INSTRUCTOR_SUMMARY, INSTRUCTOR_DESCRIPTION ) values (#{user.no}, #{user.no}, #{summary}, #{description})

SELECT PAID_LECTURE_NO as lectureNo, INSTRUCTOR_NO as insNo, LECTURE_LANG as lang, LECTURE_TITLE as title, LECTURE_LEVEL as level, LECTURE_SPECIALIZED as specialized, LECTURE_SUMMARY as summary, LECTURE_DESCRIPTION as description, LECTURE_PRICE as price, LECTURE_THUMNAIL_PATH as thumnail, LECTURE_CREATE_DATE as createDate, LECTURE_LIKES as likes, LECTURE_VIEW_COUNT as viewCount, EXPOSURE_STATUS as eStatus, APPROVE_STATUS as aStatus
FROM PAID_LECTURE
